config.keeptherain.title: KTR! Settings
config.keeptherain.preserveRainTime: Enable preserving the time left to next rain after players woke up
config.keeptherain.rainContinuationChanc: Change the chance of rain continuation after players woke up from 0(never) to 1(always)
config.keeptherain.thunderContinuationCh: Change the chance of thunder continuation after players woke up from 0(never) to 1(always when rain continuation is passed)
